about.title: About me
description: I have been enthusiastic about web development since the day I first surfed the internet. That has led me to pursue a career in web development as a .net developer. Currently, I am focusing on frontend development and it has been very exciting taking advantage of react library to build interesting frontend projects.
This website is intended to showcase all my frontend projects.

description: Here are projects I have done and some upcoming projects I will be doing during the Frontend course at Novare Potential.
